data.text: Sikh DharamSal property over 4 acres was closed on June 5, 2016

The property is financed by 20% down payment. The Principal Balance is about $1,600,000.00. The monthly ongoing mortgage payment is $9,291.58.  Current monthly expenses are approximately $18,500 (Mortgage, raggis, insurance, repair, electric & gas bills etc.) and we need your support to fulfill this payment.

We request Sangat to come forward and help with monthly payments by signing up for ongoing contributions to support Gurdwara expenses. Following are the direct links with donations starting at $101 onwards. You can select multiple amounts by selecting the quantity option. Please feel free to reach Parvinder Kaur 210-473-1635 if you have any questions about the expenses.
Your donation today and your help will inspire others to donate tomorrow.
In case you face any issues setting up the EFT payment or if you want to donate any other amount please feel free to reach out to Saran Jeet Singh
Your donation today and your help will inspire others to donate tomorrow. All the donations go to “Sikh DharamSal”
